segments.text: I'm sorry , I'm very tired . I'm going to bed early . I didn't have good time , and I don't really want to see you again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you talking about ? We had a great time . We laughed and talked all night last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was hardly all night . And I recall it was you doing all the laughing at your own jokes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not fair . We had fun . Give me a second chance . Can we meet tomorrow night for drinks at the pub ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I ' m sorry . I'm going to meet some friends tomorrow evening . And I ' m too tired now . I have to go to sleep . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
